alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:16PM CDT until June 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 916 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manchester, or 17 miles northwest of Clarksville, moving east southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Idabel, Manchester, Silver City, English, Kanawha, Negley, Kiomatia, Albion, Bryarly and Woodland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
